data.name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE: WORLD BROTHERS - Ranger (EDF4), Omega Team Colors & Special Gear
data.detailed_description: The Omega Team is a group of elite rangers who appeared in the world of "Earth Defense Force 2025" and "Earth Defense Force 4.1: The Shadow of New Despair," known for their flashy colors and high-output lasers. They are stalwart NPCs whose weapons sometimes outpower the EDF4 protagonist. This allows you to play as an EDF4 Ranger using the Omega Team colors. And for his weapon? Well, that goes without saying. Now, let the enemies enjoy the sweet taste of laser.
data.about_the_game: The Omega Team is a group of elite rangers who appeared in the world of "Earth Defense Force 2025" and "Earth Defense Force 4.1: The Shadow of New Despair," known for their flashy colors and high-output lasers. Well, that goes without saying. Now, let the enemies enjoy the sweet taste of laser.
data.short_description: The Omega Team is a group of elite rangers who appeared in the world of "Earth Defense Force 2025" and "Earth Defense Force 4.1: The Shadow of New Despair," known for their flashy colors and high-output lasers. They are stalwart NPCs whose weapons sometimes outpower the EDF4 protagonist.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller
